content:
Yes, there are several popular brands that make natural and eco-friendly candles. Some of these include:

1. P.F. Candle Co. - offers a range of natural candles, made with soy wax and phthalate-free fragrance oils.

2. Brooklyn Candle Studio - uses only natural ingredients such as soy wax, cotton wicks, and essential oils to make their candles.

3. Lite+Cycle - offers candles made with organic ingredients, recycled glass, and biodegradable packaging.

4. Boy Smells - uses coconut wax, beeswax, and vegetable waxes in their candles and is also cruelty-free.

5. Keap - produces eco-friendly candles containing organic coconut wax, natural fragrance oils, and reusable or recyclable glass containers.

These brands have gained popularity among candle enthusiasts for their sustainable and eco-friendly approach to candle-making, and for their use of natural, non-toxic ingredients.
